Item ID1101

The iron chainbody is the second weakest chainbody in RuneScape, and can be worn by a player with 1 Defence. A player with 26 Smithing can make the chainbody by using three iron bars on an anvil while carrying a hammer, granting 75 Smithing experience.

An iron chainbody is required for the Black Knights' Fortress and King's Ransom quests.

 Defence bonuses
